MonitorProperties.description: Properties specific to the monitor resource.

tenantId.description: The Active Directory tenant id of the principal.

principalId.description: The active directory identifier of this principal.

type.description: The type of managed identity assigned to this resource.

userAssignedIdentities.description: The identities assigned to this resource by the user.

IdentityProperties.description: The properties of the managed service identities assigned to this resource.

MonitoringStatus.description: Flag specifying if the resource monitoring is enabled or disabled.

MarketplaceSubscriptionStatus.description: Flag specifying the Marketplace Subscription Status of the resource. If payment is not made in time, the resource will go in Suspended state.

singleSignOnProperties.description: The details of a Dynatrace single sign-on.

emailAddress.description: Email of the user used by Dynatrace for contacting them if needed

phoneNumber.description: Phone number of the user used by Dynatrace for contacting them if needed

usageType.description: different usage type like PAYG/COMMITTED. this could be enum

billingCycle.description: different billing cycles like MONTHLY/WEEKLY. this could be enum

planDetails.description: plan id as published by Dynatrace

logRules.description: Set of rules for sending logs for the Monitor resource.

metricRules.description: Set of rules for sending metrics for the Monitor resource.

MonitoringTagRulesProperties.description: Properties for the Tag rules resource of a Monitor account.

sendAadLogs.description: Flag specifying if AAD logs should be sent for the Monitor resource.

sendSubscriptionLogs.description: Flag specifying if subscription logs should be sent for the Monitor resource.

sendActivityLogs.description: Flag specifying if activity logs from Azure resources should be sent for the Monitor resource.

filteringTags.description:
List of filtering tags to be used for capturing logs. This only takes effect if SendActivityLogs flag is enabled. If empty, all resources will be captured.
If only Exclude action is specified, the rules will apply to the list of all available resources. If Include actions are specified, the rules will only include resources with the associated tags.

LogRules.description: Set of rules for sending logs for the Monitor resource.

MetricRules.description: Set of rules for sending metrics for the Monitor resource.

filteringTags.description: List of filtering tags to be used for capturing metrics. If empty, all resources will be captured. If only Exclude action is specified, the rules will apply to the list of all available resources. If Include actions are specified, the rules will only include resources with the associated tags.

enterpriseAppId.description: Version of the Dynatrace agent installed on the VM.

singleSignOnUrl.description: The login URL specific to this Dynatrace Environment

aadDomains.description: array of Aad(azure active directory) domains

SendingLogsStatus.description: Indicates whether logs are being sent.

email.description: Reusable representation of an email address

SendAadLogsStatus.description: Indicates whether AAD logs are being sent.

SendSubscriptionLogsStatus.description: Indicates whether subscription logs are being sent.

SendActivityLogsStatus.description: Indicates whether activity logs are being sent.

name.description: The name (also known as the key) of the tag.

action.description: Valid actions for a filtering tag. Exclusion takes priority over inclusion.

FilteringTag.description: The definition of a filtering tag. Filtering tags are used for capturing resources and include/exclude them from being monitored.

SingleSignOnStates.description: Various states of the SSO resource

TagAction.description: Valid actions for a filtering tag. Exclusion takes priority over inclusion.
